mapper.select: select pno, title, userid, oprice, sprice, CAST( 100 - ( cast(sprice as float) / cast(oprice as float) )*100 as decimal ) pricert, party, cpartied, CAST( ( cast(cpartied as float) / cast(party as float) )*100 as decimal ) partyrt, edate, DATEDIFF(edate, current_date) leftd from pdetail where category = 'v' order by pno desc limit #{snum}, 8;

select pno, userid, category, title, party, cpartied, email, sdate, edate, oprice, sprice, contents, fnames, CAST( 100 - ( cast(sprice as float) / cast(oprice as float) )*100 as decimal ) pricert, CAST( ( cast(cpartied as float) / cast(party as float) )*100 as decimal ) partyrt, DATEDIFF(edate, current_date) leftd from pdetail where pno = #{pno} and category = 'v';
select count(pno) cnt from pdetail where category = 'v'
